languages.text: "Корнелиус занимает высокий пост в Адептус Администратум и именно он обнаружил ошибки, приведшие к нарушениям логистики. С его же помощью мы смогли выявить причастных к подделке документов — эти предатели добровольно признались, что действовали по приказу рода Версериан".

traits.locale_text: "Корнелиус занимает высокий пост в Адептус Администратум, и именно он обнаружил ошибки, приведшие к нарушениям логистики. С его же помощью мы смогли выявить причастных к подделке документов — эти предатели добровольно признались, что действовали по приказу рода Версериан. Дальнейшие восстания были лишь вопросом времени — среди черни быстро распространилась идея о том, что Вольный Торговец их бросил и теперь необходимо "вернуть" этот титутл "истинному" наследнику в лице... Кунрада Войгтвира."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Cornelius holds a prestigious position at the Administratum Palace and it was he who discovered the errors leading to the disrupted logistics. It is also thanks to him that we found the perpetrators of the forgeries, who admitted to acting on the orders of House Werserian."
languages.original_text: "Корнелиус занимает высокий пост в Адептус Администратум и именно он обнаружил ошибки, приведшие к нарушениям логистики. С его же помощью мы смогли выявить причастных к подделке документов — эти предатели добровольно признались, что действовали по приказу рода Версериан".

traits.locale_text: "Cornelius occupies a prestigious post at the Administratum Palace, and it has been him who had discovered the errors leading to the disruption of the logistics. It is also thanks to him that we had found the perpetrators of the forgeries, who admitted to following the orders of the House Werserian."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "Cornelius occupies a prestigious post at the Administratum Palace, and it has been him who had discovered the errors leading to the disruption of the logistics. It is also thanks to him that we had found the perpetrators of the forgeries, who admitted to following the orders of the House Werserian."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "Cornelius holds a prestigious position at the Administratum Palace and it was him who discovered the errors leading to disrupted logistics. It is also thanks to him that we found the perpetrators of the forgeries, who admitted to following the orders of House Werserian."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "Cornelius holds a prestigious position at the Administratum Palace and it was him who discovered the errors leading to disrupted logistics. It is also thanks to him that we found the perpetrators of the forgeries, who admitted to following the orders of House Werserian."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "Cornelius holds a prestigious position at the Administratum Palace and it was he who discovered the errors leading to the disrupted logistics. It is also thanks to him that we found the perpetrators of the forgeries, who admitted to acting on the orders of House Werserian."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "Cornelius holds a prestigious position at the Administratum Palace and it was he who discovered the errors leading to the disrupted logistics. It is also thanks to him that we found the perpetrators of the forgeries, who admitted to acting on the orders of House Werserian."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: 「コーネリアスは行政局宮殿で特権的な地位に就いており、物流が止まる原因となったミスを見つけたのです。ウェルザリアン家の命令に従ったという犯人の偽造文書を見つけられたのも、息子のお陰です」
languages.original_text: "Cornelius holds a prestigious position at the Administratum Palace and it was he who discovered the errors leading to the disrupted logistics. It is also thanks to him that we found the perpetrators of the forgeries, who admitted to acting on the orders of House Werserian."

traits.locale_text: 「コーネリアスは行政局宮殿で特権的な地位に就いており、物流が止まる原因となったミスを見つけたのです。ウェルザリアン家の命令に従ったという犯人の偽造文書を見つけられたのも、息子のお陰です」
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: “科尼利厄斯在宫廷行政部门担任要职，正是他发现了导致物流中断的错误。多亏了他，我们才找到了伪造文件的始作俑者。他们供认不讳，说幕后主使正是韦尔森家族。”
languages.original_text: "Cornelius holds a prestigious position at the Administratum Palace and it was he who discovered the errors leading to the disrupted logistics. It is also thanks to him that we found the perpetrators of the forgeries, who admitted to acting on the orders of House Werserian."

traits.locale_text: “科尼利厄斯在宫廷行政部门担任要职，正是他发现了导致物流中断的错误。多亏了他，我们才找到了伪造文件的始作俑者。他们供认不讳，说幕后主使正是韦尔森家族。”
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: « Cornelius occupe un poste prestigieux au palais de l'Administratum. C'est lui qui a découvert les erreurs qui ont mené aux problèmes de logistique, et c'est également grâce à lui que nous avons trouvé les auteurs des faux documents, qui ont avoué avoir suivi les ordres de la maison Werserian. »
languages.original_text: "Cornelius holds a prestigious position at the Administratum Palace and it was he who discovered the errors leading to the disrupted logistics. It is also thanks to him that we found the perpetrators of the forgeries, who admitted to acting on the orders of House Werserian."

traits.locale_text: « Cornelius occupe un poste prestigieux au palais de l'Administratum. C'est lui qui a découvert les erreurs qui ont mené aux problèmes de logistique, et c'est également grâce à lui que nous avons trouvé les auteurs des faux documents, qui ont avoué avoir suivi les ordres de la maison Werserian. »
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: «Cornelius ocupa un puesto prestigioso en el Palacio del Administratum y fue él quien descubrió los errores que provocaron la interrupción de la logística. Gracias a él también dimos con los autores de las falsificaciones, que admitieron seguir órdenes de la casa Werserian».
languages.original_text: "Cornelius holds a prestigious position at the Administratum Palace and it was he who discovered the errors leading to the disrupted logistics. It is also thanks to him that we found the perpetrators of the forgeries, who admitted to acting on the orders of House Werserian."

traits.locale_text: «Cornelius ocupa un puesto prestigioso en el Palacio del Administratum y fue él quien descubrió los errores que provocaron la interrupción de la logística. Gracias a él también dimos con los autores de las falsificaciones, que admitieron seguir órdenes de la casa Werserian».
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Cornelius hält einen angesehenen Posten im Palast des Administratums. Er hat die Fehler entdeckt, die zu den Logistikproblemen geführt haben. Und durch ihn haben wir auch die Fälscher gefunden, die gestanden haben, auf Befehl des Hauses Werserian gehandelt zu haben."
languages.original_text: "Cornelius holds a prestigious position at the Administratum Palace and it was he who discovered the errors leading to the disrupted logistics. It is also thanks to him that we found the perpetrators of the forgeries, who admitted to acting on the orders of House Werserian."

traits.locale_text: "Cornelius hält einen angesehenen Posten im Palast des Administratums. Er hat die Fehler entdeckt, die zu den Logistikproblemen geführt haben. Und durch ihn haben wir auch die Fälscher gefunden, die gestanden haben, auf Befehl des Hauses Werserian gehandelt zu haben."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Cornelius, Administratum Sarayı'nda yüksek bir mevkide görev yapıyor. Lojistik hatlarının baltalandığını da onun tespit ettiği hatalar sayesinde öğrendik. Ayrıca sahte evrakların faillerini de onun çabalarıyla yakaladık. Bu kişiler, Werserian Hanesi'nin emrinde çalıştıklarını itiraf etti."
languages.original_text: "Cornelius holds a prestigious position at the Administratum Palace and it was he who discovered the errors leading to the disrupted logistics. It is also thanks to him that we found the perpetrators of the forgeries, who admitted to acting on the orders of House Werserian."

traits.locale_text: "Cornelius, Administratum Sarayı'nda yüksek bir makamda görev yapıyor. Lojistik hatlarının baltalandığını da onun tespit ettiği hatalar sayesinde öğrendik. Ayrıca sahte evrakların faillerini de onun çabalarıyla yakaladık. Bu kişiler Werserian Hanesi emrinde çalıştıklarını itiraf etti."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor
